item.title: Load Balancer
item.description: Load balancer in Layer 4 and Layer 7 This is the first of series of knowledge sequences about technologies and stuffs. I hope you enjoy the journey. WHAT IS LOAD BALANCER? In technology, a load balancer distributes connections from clients between a set of servers to provide the best possible application performance. A server load balancing (SLB)is designed for pools of application servers within a single site or local area network (LAN)
